name: Kickcan & Conkers
description:
Shipping

To keep things simple, K&C offer flat-rate shipping:

1) France, Monaco and Andorra (Colissimo France) = 6 EUR.

2) EU and Switzerland (Colissimo International) = 14.50 EUR (please choose United Kingdom / Royaume-Uni at checkout for this zone).

3) Rest of World (Colissimo International) = 23.00 EUR (please choose United States / Etats-Unis at checkout for this zone).

Colissimo France and Colissimo International are tracked mail services. Please contact us if you would like to use an alternative, non-tracked shipping option.

name: Black Linen Clouds
description:
Beauty in simplicity!

Handmade in Estonia from black Belarusian linen these one-of-a-kind cloud decorations will add an original, creative touch to any space.

Each cloud is unique and measures approx. 60 cm.

name: Cardboard Houses
description:
We have a feeling that this simple, beautiful set of cardboard houses will appeal to little and big kids alike.

Perfect as decoration but also as a small art toy, the little Czech town is composed of nine different-sized houses made from a mix of white and brown card and corrugated cardboard. 

The largest house stands 9cm tall and all of the buildings are approx. 2.8 cm deep. The set comes in a simple brown cardboard box measuring 20 x 14 cm.

Designed by Michaela Horáčková

Love!

name: Vintage Enamel London Bus Stop Plate
description:
Come in number 352, your time is up!

Remember the iconic London Routemasters? 
This vintage white and black enamel number once hung at a Route 352 bus stop.

The plate shows signs of age but is in good distressed condition.

A great accessory for a teen's room, kid's space or office!

Enamel plate: 13 x 12.5 cm

name: Chapo Notebook
description:
Look, Mr Chapo is back, this time in the form of a small (A6) notebook.

Mélaminebonnemine's quirky illustrations make us smile, we love her fun-filled world.

Each little black and white notebook cover is printed in France on   glossy paper (280g - 15 x 10.5 cm)). The book is stapled together and contains 40 blank pages (white recycled paper 80g).

A sweet idea for party favours and stocking fillers.

name: The Salted Herring
description:
Hands up if you're a fan of André da Loba!
Ah, we thought so. Well, you're going to love this children's concertina booklet then!

Arenque Fumado / Salted Herring was first published in 1872. It was written by French author Charles Cros for his son Guy and the poem version has since been learnt by many a French child. 

Published by Bruaá, the fold-out booklet is written in Portuguese but comes with French and English translations. 

We love everything about this fun poem, including the packaging and piece of string to hang the herring on a wall.

A quirky, colourful decoration for a child's room or a creative workspace.

The booklet measures 115 x 206 mm.
Text: Charles Cross, Translation: Miguel Gouveia
Helder Guégués, Illustration: André da Loba

name: Cinderella
description:
Milimbo never disappoint. We are great fans of this Spanish publishing house's work, and love their modern, highly-stylised interpretations of traditional fairytales.

Their latest picture book presents the story of Cinderella as told by Jacob and Wilhelm Grimm. We discover a new, pious side to Cinderella in this version, revised and illustrated by Michele Galuzzo and Claudia Polizzi.

As you can see from these few photos, Cinderella is a beautiful book to be enjoyed by people of all ages. Don't hide it away in a bookcase, leave it out on display for your little ones, and let them tell you their story of Cinderella... 

In Spanish and English.
32 pages,  28 x 15.5 cm.
Print in matte paper 200 grs. Hardcover 350 grs.

name: Handmade Linen Bunnies
description:
Black or white? Take your pick, both are equally as charming!

Handmade in Estonia from natural Belarusian linen, these simple, soft rabbits will delight young and old alike.

The bunnies have certainly been eating their greens - each plush measures 48 cm long and boasts a very impressive pair of ears (34 cm)! 

For play and display, although as always, please bear in mind that this is a handmade art toy.

Materials: Linen, Polyfil. Thread
Designer: Marlen Karema

name: Cuaderniño Stamp Sets
description:
Stamp happy, that's what we are!

Susi Martinez's Spanish stamp sets are simple, striking and educational - everything we love. 

Each set includes four wooden stamps (a circle, a square, a triangle and a rectangle), a small water-based ink pad and a little colouring book with pictures, numbers and blank pages, all beautifully presented in a matching, cotton drawstring bag.

For children aged 3 to 99, we think this would make an original gift for a budding artist or printmaker, and we love the simple graphics.

The stamp set comes in three colours: red (green stamp),  green (yellow stamp), blue (pink stamp).

Colouring book: 14 x 10 cm (16 pages).
Bag size: 14 x 19 cm.


This is a handmade art toy by Heroine Paper Goods, Spain. 
It is not to be used by small children without adult supervision due to the presence of small parts.

name: Vintage Wooden Sand Train Toy
description:
This really is a very sweet vintage toy. Believed to date back to the late 60/70's, the 4-piece train set is beautifully simple, and will delight young and old toy collectors alike.

Each solid wood 'carriage" measures 14.5 x 7 x 1.5 cm. The toy has clearly seen better days ( small cracks in two , the cord is missing and the white funnel has been glued in place - see pictures) but would nevertheless make a striking display piece in a nursery, or even an unusual stacked desk toy. 

Please note the small round mark on the front carriage (old label?).

name: Journeys of Discovery and Wonder Activity Book
description:
"A little book for everyone who loves to draw".

Ed Boxall's activity books encourage creative, playful storytelling through drawing. 

The small (A6: 15 x10.5 cm) book offers four picture stories started by Ed, which your little ones will love to finish. There are 24 pages in all.

A fun present for rainy days, journeys, party favours or stocking fillers.

name: Three Neverending Stories
description:
If you are looking for something different for a child's birthday,  this collection of three puzzle-storybooks is fun, colourful and original!

Each pack contains three eye-catching paper booklets that unfold to reveal three stories in Spanish (French and English translations are provided). 

The three books measure 18 cm & 18 cm, and would also look nice opened out on display. 

Ediciones Tralari

name: Henriette & Josefine
description:
What a lovely couple Henriette and Josefine make!

Pinselblues' modern handsewn, handembroidered soft toys are made with love and we think that it shows.

Adorned in soft grey, fluorescent yellow and lilac, these two pretty dolls are perfect for the spring, but will add a little ray of sunshine to your home all year round. 

For play* & display, for an original keepsake christening gift, for birthdays or for a special treat, Henriette & Josefine will delight and charm, we're sure.

Henriette the rabbit measure 36cm, ear to toe, and Josefine measures 32cm. They are approx. 7.5 cm wide and 4cm deep.

Made from cotton, polyester filling, thread.
Plain cream cotton back.


*Henriette & Josefine are beautifully embroidered and may be more suitable for older children.

name: French Postcards #2
description:
Mélaminebonnemine is one of our favourite illustrators, and we love her range of fun postcards. 

These two new designs - Chapo and Zozettes - are quirky and original, both guaranteed to brighten up your day. 

Chapo and Zozettes are printed on glossy paper (280g) (back left blank), and would look great framed in a kid's room!

name: Baby Book
description:
If you are looking for an original, stylish baby album to record your little cherub's first smiles and first steps in the big wide world, this modern Plibook is definitely for you.  

Protected by a hardbound case, the 38-page Baby Book opens out accordian-style and is illustrated with bright, minimalist graphics,  acting as guidelines for your photos, souvenirs, drawings, thoughts, indeed whatever you want to include (we love the measuring chart).

A beautiful keepsake that you will want to display, and a great gift for grandparents, family and friends. 

9 x 18cm, English / French
ISBN : 9-7829-1945-900-1

name: Bunny Mask Kit
description:
This pack contains all you need to make yourself a pretty bunny mask; the rabbit's face, it's 2 ears and 2 ribbons to make your ties.
A fun craft activity for you and your kids, great for parties, dressing up and wall displays.
Each pack contains 1 creature mask printed on heavy card based on an original design by Abigail Brown. Fits adults and children.


Déguisez vous et vos enfants en lapin avec cet amusant kit de masque par Abigail Brown. Se composant de 2 rubans, un visage de lapin et de 2 oreilles en papier cartonné, cette charmante créature fera le bonheur des enfants au moment des fêtes et des anniversaires. Une activité facile et ludique pour les jours de pluie, qui ferait également une jolie décoration de chambre.

name: French Postcards
description:
Mélaminebonnemine's illustrations always make us smile. 

We hope these two postcards, printed in France on glossy paper 280g (back left blank) will brighten up your day.

Esprit Vertical and Monstres would look great framed in a kid's room!

name: Tepee Kits
description:
How Now Kickcan & Conkers customers!

We are delighted to be carrying this numbered, limited-edition set of six cutout-and-make tepees, designed by French company Morse.

The easy-to-assemble kit comes in the form of a booklet measuring 18 x 30 cm and includes six tepees and 18 wooden sticks. 
It is suitable for children of six years and above

We love the bright, screenprinted patterns, and can definitely see these being left out on display.

A perfect Christmas gift for little and big ones alike!




Nous sommes ravis de vous offrir cette édition limitée de six merveilleux tipis à découper crée par MORSE. 

Numérotée, et imprimée en sérigraphie, ce kit se présente sous la forme d'un livret (18 cm & 30 cm) et comprend six tipis et 18 baguettes.

Une très belle activité manuelle pour vos petits (à partir de six ans).

Parfait pour Noël !

name: Pairs-Memory Game
description:
Featuring Czech artist JouJou's quirky signature-style animal and character illustrations, this boxed set of 15 pairs of matching cards is a fun educational game designed to improve and stimulate memory. Young children love playing concentration, and this simple game can be played alone or with any number of players, the aim being to turn over as many matching pairs as possible. 

Handmade box, 30 cards (15 pairs) 7 x 10 cm
Digital printing, matt coated paper 250 gr / m

name: Sun Hat
description:
This darling little creature in a sun hat makes us smile.

Swedish artist Britt-Marie Oskarsson has a unique, naive style and we are smitten with her new series of prints.

Sun Hat is a limited-edition giclée print (40) on Epson Hot Bright paper (330g).

Signed and numbered, the actual print measures 38 x 47 cm and the paper itself  41 x 51 cm, with the white border.

Cute but not overly so, Britt-Marie's prints will appeal to children and parents looking for something different to display in their modern home.


FREE SHIPPING for this product.

name: Voilà le Facteur
description:
Oh, la, la ! Will Monsieur Bonvent manage to deliver an important letter to the Mayor in time? 

This French classic, written by Pierre Bonvallet and illustrated by Bernice Myers, tells the tale of Castagnac's trusty postman and his faithful bicycle friend Félicie. 

First published in 1957 as part of Hachette's Mon Premier Album Collection, this 1968 copy is in very good condition for its age (a couple of tiny marks).

Softcover, 20 pages, staple binding, 15.5 x 19.5 cm

name: Tit' Pom'
description:
It's been a long, long time since we've come across anything as beautiful as this French primary school book written by R. Jacquenet.

Published in 1964 by Classiques Hachette, Tit'Pom' is a collection of stories about Jean, familiarly known as Petite Pomme or Tit'Pom, on account of his chubby, rosy cheeks. 

Tit'Pom lives in the mountains, providing M. Grimaud with a perfect opportunity to demonstrate his talent for illustrating alpine flora and fauna. Every single colour illustration is delightful.

The book itself is in very good condition. It is a specimen copy and has a stamp on the first page along with a small mark where a label appears to have been. It doesn't look as if the book has ever been read. The pages are very clean, but yellowing with age, and the spine is tight. Some wear to front and back hardcover. 

A rare collector's book offering 189 pages of charming illustrations.

The book measures 22.5 x 18.5 cm.

Please visit the Kickcan & Conkers blog for more photos.

name: The Musicians of Bremen
description:
Grimm's popular fairytale is back with a bang in Corriani's  version retold by award-winning illustrator Katrin Stangl. 

The Musicians of Bremen is the story of a donkey, a cat, a dog and a rooster past their prime and no longer of use who decide to leave for Bremen to become musicians. Their journey is one of learning, friendship and union. 

Stangl's wonderfully bold illustrative style is further enhanced by red and green throughout, making this a sure winner with young and old alike.

20 pages, 22cm x 22cm, metallic staple binding


La nouvelle version du conte populaire des frères Grimm publié par Corriani. Illustré par Katrin Stangl, plusieurs fois récompensée, les Musiciens de Brême raconte l'histoire d'un âne, d'un chat, d'un chien et d'un coq qui sont devenus trop vieux pour travailler à la ferme. Ils décident de partir à Brême pour devenir musiciens.  Le voyage, l'union et l'amitié sont les grands thèmes de ce conte, haut en couleur, interprété merveilleusement bien par Stangl. 

Un très beau livre, appartenant à la collection 22 de Corriani (22cmx 22cm), qui séduira toute la famille.

20 pages, imprimé en rouge et vert, reliure par agrafage.

name: Handpainted Ornaments
description:
These five little fellows come all the way from Greece.

Handmade and handpainted, they are certainly quirky and quite unique.

Hang them on your Christmas tree during the festive season or simply leave them out on display on a wall or a shelf throughout the year.

A special ornament to keep.

Made from cloth by Psarokokalo, approx. 14 cm long and 4cm deep.

Five different models.

name: Rabbit in Striped Pyjamas
description:
A bunny balancing on a red ball, a bunny balancing on a red ball, ... go on, say it! Faster, faster - we love tongue-twisters!

We're also huge fans of the work of Swedish artist Britt-Marie Oskarsson, and are delighted to be carrying a selection of her limited-edition screenprints.

The Rabbit in Striped Pyjamas is handprinted (serigraphy) on Somerset Satin White paper (300g). It measures 28 x 38cm, and is a signed and numbered, limited-edition (26) print. The edges of the paper are deliberately rough / uneven, as hopefully highlighted by the grey background used in the second photograph.

We guarantee that this wee balancing bunny will add a fun, quirky note to any nursery, child's bedroom or playspace.

Now all you need to do is find him a name!



FREE SHIPPING for this product

name: The Gardener
description:
The Gardener made a perfect, private garden, his own ‘corner of heaven’. When his garden was destroyed he was inspired to change a derelict churchyard into a garden for everyone to share. He made a place where ‘the breeze in the leaves blew loneliness away’. This is a fairytale of re-birth: of something amazing arising from disaster.

Text and illustrations by Ed Boxall, The Pearbox Press (2006).

Soft cover, 15 x 21 cm, 32 pages of mixed media drawings printed on high quality uncoated paper.

name: Transport Poster
description:
A town in teal teeming with cars, trains, lorries, planes and helicopters... we think your little boys will love this graphic Polish transport poster just as much as we do.

Measuring 70.7 x 100 cm, this large, limited-edition print by Toprojekt (signed and numbered) is eye-catching and educational. It would obviously make a great feature in a modern boy's room and may well inspire a few future pilots and fire engine drivers over the years.

name: Zoo Picture Book
description:
We love animals made from building blocks, especially when they can speak five languages!

This beautiful, graphic picture book by Flavia Ruotolo will delight children and parents alike. Little ones will have fun trying to identify their new colourful friends in playful poses, and may even be inspired to try drawing or building some of their own. 

Each of the nineteen animals has a double-spread, with its name written in English, Italian, Spanish, German and French.

One you'll want to keep out on display!

Paperback, 44 pages, colour illustrations, 18 x 23.5 cm.
Published by MeMo Editions, France.




B for bestiaire... mais pas n'importe lequel. Savamment composés de cubes colorés, les animaux sortis de l'imagination de Flavia Ruotolo sont graphiques, rigolos et multilingues !

Vos enfants se régaleront d'identifier toutes les drôles de bêtes et seront fiers de connaître le nom de chacun de ces dix-neuf animaux en français, anglais, italien, espagnol et allemand ! 

44 pages, illustrations couleur, 18 x 23.5 cm. Broché.

Que du plaisir!

name: Bear Mask Kit
description:
This pack contains all you need to make yourself a pretty bear  mask; the bear's face, it's 2 ears and 2 ribbons to make your ties.
A fun craft activity for you and your kids, great for parties, dressing up and wall displays.
Each pack contains 1 creature mask printed on heavy card based on an original design by Abigail Brown. Fits adults and children.


Déguisez vous et vos enfants en ours avec cet amusant kit de masque par Abigail Brown. Se composant de 2 rubans, un visage d'ours et de 2 oreilles en papier cartonné, cette charmante créature fera le bonheur des enfants au moment des fêtes et des anniversaires. Une activité facile et ludique pour les jours de pluie, qui ferait également une jolie décoration de chambre.

name: Kiddicraft Sea Puzzle
description:
We love vintage jigsaws, and think they're a fun way of adding a graphic touch to your home.

This bright and colourful sea scene would look striking on a shelf and could even be framed if you wanted to make sure it stayed in tip-top condition.

The puzzle is made from plywood, contains 13 pices and measures 24 x 20 cm. It is 0.5 cm deep.

Overall in very condition  (70 /80s?), just a couple of scribbles in coloured pencil on the back.

name: Bonnie Biscuit Book Cover
description:
To sell or not to sell, that is the question...

It's taken us quite a while to make up our mind but voilà ! here she is, Mademoiselle Brun is looking for a new home.

Printed in the mid-Fifties, this French school book cover advertising Brun Biscuits will hopefully make you smile. We suspect the paper was once a lot lighter but the simple, stylish graphics in red and blue are bright and fresh. 

This bonnie little girl will look striking in a frame anywhere in your home.

Measures: 17.5 x 24 cm.
Frame not provided.

name: Blue Bug Paper Friend
description:
Blanca Helga's Paper Friends Collection is everything we love.
Creative, fun and eco-friendly, made from recycled card and paper, this colourful blue bug wallhanging will delight little and big kids alike.
Amazing what you can do with a bit of imagination...

Gold stars all round, it's perfect!

Measures:  16 x 20 cm.
Comes signed and sealed in a protective cellophane sleeve.

name: Ice Circus
description:
Welcome to the magical world of Swedish artist Britt-Marie Oskarrson!

We love her playful, naive style, and are delighted to bring you a small selection of her most recent limited-edition prints.

Ice Circus is a beautiful giclée print on Innova Smooth Cotton High White 330g paper. It measures 49.5 x 39.5 cm (paper size: 52 x 42cm) and is signed and numbered. 

A perfect gift for someone special, Ice Circus will delight young and old alike. 

FREE SHIPPING for this product.

name: The Shell Collector
description:
"One day when I was small I walked inside a sea shell.
I waved goodbye to my friends on the shore and found myself in the branches of a tall tree.
The branches were as wide as roads and the sky full of places to go…”

A story-poem about the miraculous possibilities of a seashell, beautifully illustrated by Ed Boxall.

Perfect for children, dreamers and nature lovers of any age.

Soft cover, 15 x 21 cm, text and illustrations by Ed Boxall, The Pearbox Press (2006)

28 pages of mixed media drawings printed on high quality uncoated paper.

name: Modern Mask Set
description:
Time for some graphic fun! 

MORSE's cut-and-make masks are bright, colourful and bang on trend.

Each kit includes six sheets (28 cm x 32 cm) of easy-to-make OFFSET masks, measuring approximately 26 cm x 29 cm once completed.

Modern masks for modern families, they're perfect for parties, gifts and Christmas.

Play and display, the geometric way - love! 





Un coup de foudre pour ce kit de masques OFFSET, crée par MORSE.

Résolument moderne, chaque kit comprend six planches à découper (28cm x 32cm) permettant de fabriquer six masques mesurant 26 cm x 29 cm environ.

Que la fête graphique commence !

name: Sophie & Clementine
description:
Modern, quirky and fun - Sophie & Clementine certainly have everything going for them!

A spot of pink, a touch of grey and a flash of electric orange, these young girls know what suits them and we love the details on their clothes. 

Pinselblues' unique, handsewn, handembroidered soft toys are made with love and we think that it shows. Both these little ladies are quite unique, and would look very special in your home.

Sophie & Clementine are approx. 32cm long, 7cm wide and 3.5 cm deep.

Made from cotton, polyester filling, thread.
With a plain cream cotton back.


*These handmade dolls are beautifully embroidered and may be more suitable for older children.

name: L'Automobile by Alain Grée
description:
Published in 1978 by Casterman, L'Automobile is the fifteenth book in the Achille et Bergamote Cadet-Rama Series.

You really can't help but smile as you flick through all 30 pages of this happy, colourful book, jam-packed with Alain Gree's illustrations.

Achille and Bergamote are not very 'au fait' with the world of cars but Monsier Cyprien, a friendly engineer, is there to teach them everything there is to know. 

In his usual prolific but jovial style, Alain Grée takes his readers racing, to an assembly line and under the bonnet, without driving them round the bend!

All in all an action-packed adventure that you will never tire of following, even if you don't understand too much French.

In good vintage condition, pages clean, spine tight. Hardback.

28 cm x 21 cm

name: Dragon Paper Friend
description:
Blanca Helga's Paper Friends Collection embodies everything we love.
Creative, fun and eco-friendly, made from recycled card and paper, this large (seeing is believing, really!) Dragon wall hanging will delight little and big kids alike. Amazing what you can do with a little bit of imagination...

Gold stars all round, it's perfect!

Measures: 37 x 24 cm
Comes signed and sealed in a protective cellophane sleeve.

name: Princess in Red Bikini
description:
Isn't she wonderful? Who would have thought that a princess in a red bikini could be so cute? 

Britt-Marie Oskarsson is one of our favourite artists and we are delighted to be carrying a selection of her very special prints.

This beautiful little princess is handprinted (serigraphy) on Somerset White Satin paper (300g) and is signed and numbered (limited-edition of 23). The print measures 17 x 27cm and the paper 28 x 38 cm. 

Forget the ballgowns and glass slippers, bikinis are in, and this screenprint will delight little and big girls alike! 


FREE SHIPPING for this product.

name: Little Kittens Paper House Kit
description:
One of Kickcan & Conkers' favourite finds this year! 

Hutch Studio's easy-to-make paper houses look great on a bookshelf, strung up together in a garland or hung in a window, as shown in the last photograph below.

This little paper house kit consists of "reprinted" vintage book pages on heavy weight cardstock. The pieces are pre-scored for easy folding and have peel & stick tavs for simple assembly. Instructions are included.

The book used for this little house is "3 Little Kittens". 
The house measures 10.2 cm h x 6.4 cm w x 6.4 cm d when completed.

Why not start a collection now!


Cheaper non-tracked shipping options available on request

name: Japanese Salt & Pepper Eggcups
description:
Will you just look at these two little cuties all dressed up in pink and blue! 

The pretty lady may have lost a teeny tiny bit of her painted hair but that's barely noticeable when you pop on her wooden egg hat!

We love vintage wooden eggcups and when they come from Japan and double up as a salt & pepper pot set we love it even more!

Both salt & pepper eggs (five holes in each) have their stoppers but the cream egg has a paint chip (see photo).

For play and display, on a shelf in your kitchen or in a child's room perhaps?

The wooden eggcups stand 8 cm tall without the eggs and 12.5 cm with.

The nicest 'eggheads' we've ever come across!

name: Green Oururabalu Paper Friend
description:
Can you say it, Oururabalu? Go on, faster, faster...try again!

Blanca Helga's Paper Friends Collection is everything we love.
Creative, fun and eco-friendly, made from recycled card and paper, this colourful green-faced wallhanging will delight little and big kids alike.
Amazing what you can do with a bit of imagination...

Gold stars all round, it's perfect!

Measures:  23 x 31 cm.
Comes signed and sealed in a protective cellophane sleeve 
(one paper friend only)

Oh, and if if you like our paper garland, why not buy some of our paper house kits to make one of your own?

name: P for Panier
description:
A basket for your Easter eggs, perhaps?

We think this vintage French teaching aid will look striking in your home, all year round. 

Part of the "Je Veux Lire" collection published by Hachette / Rossignol in the late 60's, this one-sided flashcard was used to teach French children the "ier"sound in "panier" (basket).

The card has pinholes and is in reasonable condition for its age.
It measures 20 x 23.5 cm.

name: First Steps Poster
description:
Les Premiers Pas ...

Seeing is believing! The colours in this 1950 / 60's French school poster are vibrant and fresh, almost as new, in fact. It seems hard to believe that it was once on display in a classroom.

The edges are a little worn, with a few small tears, but they wouldn't show in a frame.  Other than that, this vintage French educational poster by Hélène Poirier is in  good, clean condition and would look lovely in a child's room or anywhere else in your home.

We love the pops of red against the pastel background in this charming family scene.

The poster measures 53 x 75 cm.

name: Vintage Metal Jug
description:
Pink, pretty and petite, this vintage French jug will sit neatly on a shelf, a small table or chest of drawers, indeed anywhere in your home.

Start a new collection, fill it with flowers or use it to decorate a nursery or a little girl's bedroom, we're sure you'll appreciate its shabby-chic charm.

The dark pink jug stands 16cm tall and is 10.5cm in diameter. Purely decorative, it has a few rust spots on the top rim, base and handle, but is in good condition overall.

name: Love You Greetings Cards
description:
Nothing beats a hug and a kiss from Mum.
Show some love and affection by sending one of these beautiful Mum and Daughter cards by Serbian illustrator Manja Radic. Perfect for birthdays, Mother's Day or just to say I Love You.

Two different designs:
Hug:  pale pink/yellow
Kiss: pale green/orange

15 x 10.5 cm, digital print, white paper card 300g.

name: Small Wooden Puppet
description:
Found at an auction house in Great Britain, this happy little chap would look lovely hanging in a child's room.

We have no idea of his age or origin, but are sure that kids will adore his cute wooden face.

Handpainted features, wooden head, feet and hands. 
Wearing a brown shirt and matching sage cap and dungarees. 

The puppet is in very good condition, all the strings are there and the wooden cross to which they are attached will make it very easy to hang up high.

A sweet decorative piece, not necessarily vintage but special all the same.

35 cm long, including strings.

name: Colouring Book Paper House Kit
description:
One of Kickcan & Conkers' favourite finds!

Hutch Studio's easy-to-make paper houses look great on a bookshelf, strung up together in a garland or hung in a window, as shown in the last photograph below.

This little paper house kit consists of "reprinted" vintage book pages on heavy weight cardstock. The pieces are pre-scored for easy folding and have peel & stick tavs for simple assembly. Instructions are included.

The book used for this little house is "Colouring Book".
The house measures 10.2 cm h x 6.4 cm w x 6.4 cm d when completed.

Why not start a collection now!


(cheaper shipping options available for non-tracked service)

name: Vintage Rowntree's Fruit Gums Advert
description:
"Taste the delicious fruit".

Hands up if you like Rowntree's fruit gums. Alan Mott did. He's the 8 year old boy who drew this charming advertisement in the early 50's, when Daddys got a packet of cigarettes for Christmas and Mummys got a bunch of flowers... Did you know they first came out in 1881? 

This large full-page colour advert was taken from the Illustrated, and has been mounted and matted so that all you need is a frame.

We think it would look super on a wall in your kitchen or office, unless your kids 'bags it' first...

Measures 42.5cm x 34 cm.

In excellent condition.

name: Dick Bruna's Animal Book
description:
Dick Bruna's Animal Book is perhaps one of his lesser known works but will delight young and old alike.

First published in 1974, this vintage (1981) hardback copy is in good condition and chock full of Dick Bruna's simple, happy illustrations.

Giraffes, camels, elephants, kaolas, ... it makes a change to see Bruna trying his hand at the animal kingdom, especially penguins and polar bears!

A Methuen Children's Book, the pages are all clean but some are slightly creased. Certainly very readable.

name: Dziadek Z Babka / Grandpa and Grandma
description:
A delightful, original children's book by Pan Tu Nie Stal. 
Based on a popular Eastern Polish folk tale, beautifully illustrated by Katarzyna Bogucka, this 10-page soft-cover book tells the story of Grandpa and Grandmas' ups and downs throughout the seasons in their village called Harmony. 

Primarily a picture book with little Polish text. 

Measures 15cm x 15 cm, printed on card in metallic blue and brown.

Un très beau livre pour enfant par Pan Tu Nie Stal. Basé sur un conte folklorique célèbre de l'est de Pologne, et merveilleusement illustré par Katarzyna Bogucka, ce livre original raconte les bonheurs et les malheurs d'un Grand père et d'une Grand mère à travers les saisons.
Principalement un livre à images, avec peu de texte en polonais. L'histoire est néanmoins très facile à comprendre.

10 pages, 15cm X 15cm.
Imprimé sur papier glacé en bleu-gris et marron.

name: Kitty Mask Set
description:
This pack contains all you need to make yourself a pretty cat mask; the kitty's face, it's 2 ears and 2 ribbons to make your ties.

A fun craft activity for you and your kids, great for parties, dressing up and wall displays.

Each pack contains 1 creature mask printed on heavy card based on an original design by Abigail Brown. Fits adults and children.


Déguisez vos enfants en chat avec cet amusant kit de masque par Abigail Brown. Se composant de 2 rubans, un visage de chat et de 2 oreilles en papier cartonné, ce joli minou fera le bonheur des enfants au moment des fêtes et des anniversaires.

Une activité facile et ludique pour les jours de pluie, qui ferait également une jolie décoration de chambre.

name: Polish Cardboard Town
description:
Robert Czajka's cardboard toy set inspired by modern Polish suburbia is one of the nicest eco-towns we know. 

Easy to make (punch-out and assemble), each kit contains four sheets of modern buildings, cars, a fence, a tree, a shop, a fountain and a garage, all made from sturdy, recycled cardboard. We love the bright graphics and think you'll be tempted to leave the set out on display. For little and big kids alike!

4 pre-punched cardboard sheets: 30 x 38 cm
Biggest element folded to size: 10 x 8 x 8 cm

name: Little Artist
description:
Colourful, quirky and fun!

There's no doubt about it, this bright and cheerful limited-edition (40) Giclee print by Swedish artist Britt-Marie Oskarsson would make a striking, playful feature in any child's room!

This Little Artist is printed on Innova Smooth Cotton High White paper (315 g ) and comes with a white border.

The actual print size is 30 x 42 cm.
Paper size: 42 x 54 cm.

Bright, Bold & Beautiful, for your little artists.


FREE Shipping for this product.

name: Arabic Alphabet Poster #2
description:
Do you know your Alif Baa Taa?

Simple, colourful and striking, we're always on the lookout for new alphabet prints and this modern Arabic one ticks all our boxes.

Printed on 100# gloss cover and measuring 43 x 28cm it will look perfect in a frame anywhere in your home.

Poster printed in blues, oranges and greys.

An original, modern find for little and big kids alike.

name: Squeaky Rubber Doll
description: The years have passed but this little doll hasn't lost its squeak. Standing 16cm tall, and clad in buttermilk yellow, this rubber doll  would add a charming vintage note to any child's room.

name: Cut Out & Dress Mr and Mrs Peg
description:
Let me introduce you to Mr and Mrs Peg, two delightful paper dolls designed by Alice Melvin. Hours of good old-fashioned fun await your children with this cut out and dress couple and accompanying wardrobe. 

Each A5 sized (21x15 cm) pack contains both Mr and Mrs Peg and their fun coordinated outfits.


Laissez-moi vous présenter M et Mme Epingle à linge, deux adorables poupées en papier créées par Alice Melvin. Facile à découper, ces deux petits personnages amuseront vos enfants pendant des heures. Comment va-t-il s'habiller M. Epingle à linge aujourd'hui ? Est-ce que Mme a froid dans son maillot de bain ? 

Chaque kit format A5 (21 x 15cm) contient deux poupées en papier et leurs ensembles

name: PLOC Magazine (UK) - Vol 01
description:
PLOC = New = Fun!

In case you hadn't heard, we have a new word for you: PLOC.

PLOC is the happy mag for little ones, exclusively illustrated by 60s French legend Alain Gree.

It's a happy magazine, packed with original games, stories to colour in and read and plenty of fun facts to keep our friends' little brains ticking!

You won't find a single line of advertising in PLOC but you will discover how bread is made and how to count with happy birds on a wire. 

PLOC is a magazine about learning, it's full of stories and activities, and all the artwork consists of original drawings by 60s French illustrator Alain Grée, whose work is timeless and delightfully happy.

PLOC is for little ones (3-8) and everyone young at heart.

Got it?

name: Child's Gingham Apron
description:
Pat-a-cake, pat-a-cake, baker's man
Bake me a cake as fast as you can...

Baking's fun, and it's even better if you look the part. We're sure many a little girl would be pleased as punch to wear this pretty pinny to help Mummy in the kitchen.

In yellow and blue gingham with a white braid trim and heart shaped pocket, the apron is in good condition, and even looks nice  displayed on a wall!

name: Pull-Along Ducks
description:
We're pretty sure that this dashing pair of pull-a-long ducks will bring a smile to your face when you see them passing by. They even have a little bell that rings when they bob up and down. It's very sweet indeed.

Made in France in the 1960's, this classic Educalux toy is in full working order and in very good condition for its age. Both beaks have lost a bit of colour and there's one little paint chip on the green wooden base but that's barely noticeable.

A beautiful, bright vintage toy which would look lovely on display in a nursery or child's room.

The ducks stand 28 cm tall and are 20 cm long.
 They are made from wood, plastic and metal (bell).

name: Antique Musical Stacking Blocks
description:
Who needs an iPod when you have a set of eight cardboard stacking blocks with bells inside? 

Once upon a time, these musical toys will have given hours of pleasure to little boys and girls, and today we think they will look striking on a shelf.

Each stacking block (8.5 x 8.5 x 8.5 cm) has five different illustrations, one of which includes a letter, a number and a musical note. They all have bells inside, which still work but clearly not as well as they used to.

The set is in very good, clean condition for its age, with only a few marks and a small tear. 

A wonderful decorative piece for a child's room or an interesting prop for a shop display.

name: Cut & Make Rocking Horse Card
description:
Send some creative joy with this ‘Cut Out and Make’ greetings card by Alice Melvin. The beautiful red rocking horse card contains easy to follow instructions to allow the recipient to create an attractive 3D structure. 

Perfect for newborn babies and christenings!

The card measures 17x12.5 cm when folded and comes with a brown craft envelope. It is blank inside for your own message and has been printed on paper from FSC certified source.



Au pas, au trot, au galop !
Offrez cette ludique carte de voeux par Alice Melvin et transformez son destinataire en cavalier chevronné le temps de rêver quelques heures. Facile à découper et à assembler, cette carte vierge en forme de cheval à bascule rouge mesure 17x12.5 cm une fois pliée et a été imprimé sur du papier certifié FSC. Une enveloppe en papier kraft est également fournie.

Un joli cadeau de naissance ou de baptême.

name: Oururabalu Paper Friend
description:
Can you say it, Oururabalu? Go on, faster, faster...try again!

Blanca Helga's Paper Friends Collection is everything we love.
Creative, fun and eco-friendly, made from recycled card and paper, this colourful Oururabalu wallhanging will delight little and big kids alike. 
Amazing what you can do with a bit of imagination...

Gold stars all round, it's perfect!


Measures: 28 x 29 cm.
Comes signed and sealed in a protective cellophane sleeve.

name: Arabic Alphabet Poster #1
description:
Do you know your Alif Baa Taa?

Simple, colourful and striking, we're always on the lookout for new alphabet prints and this playful Arabic one ticks all our boxes.

Printed on 100# gloss cover and measuring 43 x 28cm it will look perfect in a frame anywhere in your home.

A modern find for little and big kids alike.

name: Suzanne
description:
Oh Suzanne, you're one-of-a-kind! 

You may be over 50 years' old, you're looking as sweet as ever. We're sure you'll steal some little or big girl's heart. 

You're clothes are so stylish and bright, after all this time. Gosh, you really do have such a pretty wardrobe. 

Suzanne was made in Helsingborg Sweden. She's a cardboard doll print and comes with nine different outfits. 

This is a beautiful vintage find, in good condition (a couple of barely visible creases),  that would look very striking framed.

The printed cardboard sheet measures 47.5 x 33.5 cm.

name: PLOC Magazine (FR) Vol 01
description:
Bienvenue dans le monde de PLOC !

C'est quoi PLOC ? Comment, vous ne le savez pas encore ?

PLOC c'est un nouveau magazine joyeux pour les petits, illustré exclusivement par le légendaire artiste français Alain Grée.

PLOC c'est un nouveau magazine pour s'éduquer tout en s'amusant, en apprenant, par exemple comment le pain est fait ou quels animaux vivent à la ferme. 

PLOC c'est une cinquantaine de pages de bonheur ; des jeux originaux, des histoires colorées et des dessins à colorier. 

PLOC c'est pour garçons et filles ages de moins de 8 ans. Et pour toute la famille aussi !

Lire - Apprendre - Jouer

C'est PLOC...

name: Cut Out & Make Space Rocket Card
description:
Send some creative joy and help fulfil childhood dreams of becoming an astronaut with this ‘Cut Out and Make’ greetings card by Alice Melvin. Our super fun space rocket card contains easy to follow instructions to allow the recipient to have their own mini space adventure.
The card measures 17x12.5 cm when folded and comes with a brown craft envelope. It is blank inside for your own message and has been printed on paper from FSC certified source.

Qui n'a pas rêvé de voler dans l'espace ? Offrez cette ludique carte de voeux par Alice Melvin et transformez son destinataire en astronaute parcourant l'univers. Facile à découper et à assembler, cette carte vierge mesure 17x12.5 cm une fois pliée et a été imprimé sur du papier certifié FSC. Une enveloppe en papier kraft est également fournie.

name: East German Toy Cleaning Set
description:
Oh...
This is the way we scrub the floor,
We scrub the floor, we scrub the floor.
This is the way we scrub the floor,
On a cold and frosty morning.

Well, it doesn't look as if anyone's been busy cleaning their doll's house with this vintage set of buckets, brushes and brooms. As you can see from the photographs, all of the miniatures are in good, unused condition, except for the tiny dishcloth, which is fraying around the edges.

This toy is enjoying a bit of a revival, having recently been repackaged and modernised, however our set is an original, made in the German Democratic Republic. It comprises a metal bucket, plastic broom, plastic scrubbing brush, plastic soap dish, bar of soap, sponge, miniature washing powder box and mop/dishcloth. The box itself is in reasonable condition (see photos) and would look very sweet on display.

The box measures: 18.5 cm long x 6. cm wide x 7 cm deep.

For toy collectors and nostalgic parents. 
This is a decorative object and does not comply with current toy safety standards.

name: Swedish Easter Paper Decoration
description:
Clean and bright, this vintage paper decoration is perfect for Easter or for adding a Springtime touch to your home.

The decoration is printed on both sides and measures 60cm unfolded.

name: Prove It
description:
Did you know that you can stretch air and hear with your teeth? Had you even thought about it before? 

Prove It! by Rose Wyler and Gerald Ames (published by Harper & Row in 1963) may contain the answers to some of your questions and will keep you smiling along the way.

We love vintage children's science books and this A Science I CAN READ Book is no exception.

Hardcover, no dust jacket, slight shelf wear to bottom edge of front cover.
64 pages in clean, bright condition.

name: Siata Baba Mak
description:
An Old Lady was Sowing Poppy Seeds.

A delightful, original children's book by Pan Tu Nie Stal. Based on a simple Polish folk poem, beautifully illustrated by Katarzyna Bogucka, this 10-page soft-cover book tells the story of an old lady who wanted to grow poppies but didn't know how. She eventually finds a solution.

Primarily a picture book with little Polish text. 

Measures 15cm x 15 cm

Printed on card in red-orange and black (please note the book is not as red as it appears on the photographs, it's actually more flourescent orange).



Un très beau livre pour enfant par Pan Tu Nie Stal. Basé sur un poème folklorique polonais, et merveilleusement illustré par Katarzyna Bogucka, ce livre original raconte l'histoire d'une vieille dame qui voulait faire pousser des coquelicots mais ne savait pas comment s'y prendre. Elle finit par trouver une solution.
Principalement un livre à images, avec peu de texte en polonais.

10 pages, 15cm X 15cm.
Imprimé sur papier glacé en rouge-orange et noir (le livre est beaucoup moins rouge qu'il apparaît sur les photos, en fait il est rouge-orange fluo).

name: Large Ralston Purina Flash Card
description:
William H. Danforth was famous for his Monday motivational messages, among many other things. As far as we're concerned, they don't come better than these two, printed on a large vintage flash card from Ralston Purina's educational department.

There is no indication of age but barring a few drawing pin holes and some yellowing, this large, double-sided card is in very good condition.

"Never lose your capacity for enthusiasm" and 'The hardest thing to open is a closed mind" - a double dose of bright red and blue inspiration, for every day of the week, with a checkerboard logo to boot.

35.5 x 27.5 cm
Printed in USA

name: GOLO
description:
There's no limit to what you can make with a GOLO! A slight exaggeration perhaps, but once you've had a good look at the photos, we're sure you will agree that these wooden GOLO puzzles are fun, educational and incredibly versatile.

Handmade in the Czech Republic, each round puzzle is presented in a small 12 x 12 cm box, and includes an inspiration booklet. 

GOLOs come in five different main colours (red, green, yellow, blue and natural) and comply with current EC toy safety regulations.
 
A designer toy for young and old alike, however, due to the presence of small parts, GOLOs are not recommended for children under 5 years.

name: Vintage Munchmallow Biscuits Advert
description:
Believe it or not, for once, we're actually too young to remember Glasgow's original Munchmallow biscuits. We've heard they were very tasty though and Macdonalds' adverts are certainly still very pleasing to the eye. 

This large full-page colour advert, taken from the Illustrated (1953), has been mounted and matted so all you need is a frame. 

We think it would look super on a wall in your kitchen or office, unless your kids 'bags it' first...

Measures 42.5cm x 34 cm. 
In excellent condition, ready to frame.

name: Whale Softie
description:
Kate Durkin's animal pillows appeal to people of all ages. 

This pale dark blue whale measures approximately 24cm long and 15cm wide (tail). It is handembroidered with white and red heavy duty thread on the front and has a pretty white and blue floral pattern on the back.
Stuffed with a super soft poly-fill.

Modern and versatile, it would look great on a sofa, a shelf or simply in your child's arms.

name: Cut-Make-Play Circus
description:
Roll up! Roll up! It's creative, crafty circus time folks! 

Lovely Pigeon's Cut-Make-Play Circus comes in the form of two A3 card sheets and includes eleven performers, a circus ring, slotted stands, custard pies and a bike.

Find yourself a pair of scissors, start cutting and watch all your favourite circus performers (The Ringmaster, The Bearded Lady, Mr and Mrs Acrobat, the Bespectacled Bear, Tiny Tiny Elephant, Cheeky Monkey...) come to life!

Packaged in a cellophane envelope with instructions.

name: Travel Journal
description:
Travel in style, the saying goes...

PiqPoq's modern travel journal, part of the Plibook collection, is a perfect gift for globetrotters or anyone on the move who appreciates practical, good-looking design.

Protected by a hardbound case, the 38-page journal opens out accordian-style and is illustrated with clean modern graphics acting as guidelines for your photos, souvenirs, drawings, thoughts, indeed whatever you want to include (we love the weather chart, in particular).

A sleek, stylish book that you'll be tempted to write in often and leave out on display.

9x18cm, English / French
ISBN : 9-7829-1945-901-8
Weight: 195g

name: Majster Klepka Cut Out & Make Shop
description:
Step back in time with this Polish cut-out and make children's magazine Majster Klepka (Jack of all Trades). 

Illustrated by Maciek Blazniak, this amusing Communist-era butcher's shop owned by Mrs Leokadia and Mr. Mieczysław Golonko (Knuckle) comes complete with delivery van, shop accessories and Polish sausages!

Measures 34 x 49 cm, straight-forward assembly (2-3 hours). 
No instructions provided (in Polish).



Le premier numéro d'un très beau magazine polonais de découpage pour enfants, illustré par Maciek Blazniak, Majster Klepka (l'homme à tout faire). 

Enfants et parents pourront jouer des heures durant avec cette boucherie de l'époque communiste, Mme Leokadia et Mr. Mieczysław Golonko, leur camion de livraison, accessoires magasin et charcuterie polonaise !

34cm x 49 cm, facile à assembler (comptez 2-3 heures).
Notice d'assemblage non-fournie (en polonais).

name: La Luna Sabe A Pescao
description:
Juanjo Oller sees poetry everywhere, in all the little everyday things that make up our reality. He is inspired by Federico G.Lorca, Gloria Fuertes, Machado, and the wonderful, magical creativity of children.

La Luna Sabe A Pesca is a poem. No need for words in this stylised picture book. Turn over the pages one by one and let your imagination do the rest. 

13x13cm
30 pages + soft covers
Printed on Cyclus offset paper 200 grs.

name: Mail Box Bank
description:
Save in style with this tin US mail box money bank, made by Ohio Art in the 60's.

As you can see from the photographs, the red, white and blue lithos are clean and crisp all over, and feature a small table on the front showing how much you can put aside a year if you save a certain amount per day.

There is a hole in the back to hang up the box and a stopper underneath. We even have the key, believe it or not!

A nice vintage decorative item, with only a few minor rust spots on the base.

The tin bank measures: 15 x 10 x5.3/4 cm.

Buy it and start saving now!

name: Large Ralston Purina Flash Card #2
description:
So, let's begin...

A while ago we came across a set of vintage Ralston Purina flashcards featuring a few of William H. Danforth's famous Monday morning motivational messages. We think they're perfect for a teenager's room, but you might be tempted to buy one for yourself.

There is no indication of age but barring a few drawing pin holes and some yellowing, this large, double-sided card is in very good condition.

A double dose of inspiration, for every day of the week, with a checkerboard logo to boot.

35.5 x 27.5 cm
Printed in USA, of course.

name: Cardboard Soldiers
description:
Take ease men!

Eight cardboard soldiers waiting to stand guard in your son's bedroom, or watch over you from upon a shelf. 

They are a proud 18 cm tall and their lithographed cardboard is bright and clean.  The soldiers are nailed to small wooden bases. 

In very good vintage condition (30-40s?)

Nothing else to report, Sir!

name: Horse-Like Paper Friend
description:
Blanca Helga's Paper Friends Collection is everything we love.

Creative, fun and eco-friendly, made from recycled card and paper, this very sweet horse-like wall hanging will delight little and big kids alike. Amazing what you can do with a bit of imagination...

Gold stars all round, it's perfect!

Measures: 31 x 21cm
Comes signed and sealed in a protective cellophane sleeve.

name: Slappy The Duck Paper House Kit
description:
One of Kickcan & Conkers' favourite finds!

Hutch Studio's easy-to-make paper houses look great on a bookshelf, strung up together in a garland or hung in a window, as shown in the last photograph below.

This little paper house kit consists of "reprinted" vintage book pages on heavy weight cardstock. The pieces are pre-scored for easy folding and have peel & stick tavs for simple assembly. Instructions are included.

The book used for this little house is "Slappy The Duck".
The house measures 10.2 cm h x 6.4 cm w x 6.4 cm d when completed.

Why not start a collection now!


(cheaper, non-tracked shipping options available upon request) service)

name: Abbatt Toys Farm Puzzle
description:
Another very collectible handpainted puzzle by the British educationalists / toy makers Paul and Marjorie Abbatt. 

It's actually one of my son's favourites, so shhh! Don't tell him you've seen it here!

This large wooden jigsaw dating back to the 30-50's, depicts a typical farm scene, complete with haystack, Shire horse and muddy pigs.

The colours are still very bright but the paint is chipped in places. The young boy in knee high socks (you don't see many of those nowadays do you?) has lost a tiny bit of his left foot (worn away rather than broken) so he'd be wise to remain seated for as long as he can. 

All in all, an original display piece for a child's room, a toy collector or anyone who appreciates great graphics.

Plywood, paint.
32.5 x 45 cm
6 lift-out pieces
Made by Abbatt Toys, England.

name: Large Ralston Purina Flash Card #3
description:
The Present is Big with the Future... yes, we like that a lot!

A while ago we came across a set of vintage Ralston Purina flashcards featuring a few of William H. Danforth's famous Monday morning motivational messages. We think they're perfect for a teenager's room, but you might be tempted to buy one for yourself.

There is no indication of age but barring a few drawing pin holes and some yellowing, this large, double-sided card is in very good condition.

A double dose of inspiration, for every day of the week, with a checkerboard logo to boot.

35.5 x 27.5 cm
Printed in USA, of course.

name: Duck Puzzle
description:
Perfect for Spring time, this vintage French wooden tray puzzle will add a fresh note to any nursery or child's room in your home.

Much loved since it was first made in the Seventies it is nevertheless bright and in good overall condition. The previous owner has coloured in the duck drawing underneath, but that can be removed and doesn't detract from the cuteness of the jigsaw in anyway.

The puzzle measures 21.5 x 18.5 cm. The tray is 1cm deep.

Would make a sweet vintage gift for Easter!

name: Galt Number Plaques
description:
I can sing a rainbow, sing a rainbow to you...

1970's design in all its glory! This bright and cheerful wooden counting puzzle from British company Galt Toys will definitely add some colour to a child's room, be it in a frame on their wall or in their toy box.

Let your little one (from 3 years upwards)* learn to count to ten whilst completing the thirty-piece plywood puzzle (10 number plaques in all) whilst you quietly reach for your sunglasses.

Puzzle clean and complete.
Box sellotaped and in bad condition.

Box: 15 x 16 cm.
Each number plaque: 14.5 x 7.5cm

*For play & display, although, please note, vintage toys no longer comply with EC Toy Safety Standards.

name: Mini Maxi
description:
Back to basics! 

This bright red minimalist design book is a wonderful way to brush up your French or teach your children opposites. 

Learn how empty becomes full, houses become buildings and clicks become bangs...Didier Cornille's imaginative illustrations and paper fold-outs will arouse your children's curiosity and heighten their powers of observation. 

A fun, beautifully made book that would make a lovely gift. 

Hardback, 64 pages, 12 x 15 cm.
4 years and upwards.


Un petit déclic et un gros bang, une grande limo, un p’tit bolide... tout et son contraire ! Ce petit livre sur le thème des contraires est une merveille. 

Rouge vif au design minimaliste, ce livre-objet imaginatif par Didier Cornille sollicite la curiosité et la capacité d’observation des enfants. De page en page il transforme le vide en plein, le vertical en horizontal, le rond en carré et nous surprend même avec quelques jolis dépliages.  

64 pages, 12 x 15 cm 
à partir de 4 ans

name: Blue Boat
description:
The Blue Boat is one of Dick Bruna's lesser well-known books and was written by Peter Jones with the help of mothers of boys and girls with hearing impairment. It was published by Methuen in 1984 for the National Deaf Children's Society in the UK.

Blue Boat tells the story of Ben, a little boy who is deaf. It is a book for all children, explaining Ben's special needs in a warm and friendly way. 
As always, Dick Bruna's bright and colourful illustrations are just plain lovely.

Hardback. No Dust Jacket. 24 pages.

Some signs of shelf wear to spine and cover edge, very clean inside.

name: Serbian Girl Cards
description:
Power to girls! 

Manja Radic's Super and Strong cards make us smile. 

Impress your friends and family with a smattering of Serbian, at any time of year. 

We all need a bit of a lift sometimes, dont we?

15 x 10.5 cm, digital print, white paper card 300g.
Standard white envelope.

Two different designs: Super & Strong. Price per card.

name: Child's Metal Pail
description:
It's hard not to feel nostalgic when you come across a little treasure like this. 

Although plastic was the material of choice for our bucket and spade, this tin pail brings back memories of the British seaside, including Blackpool rock, donkey rides and knickerbocker glories. 

Small but in fair-good vintage condition (few rust spots inside the pail, along the rim and on the handle), this tin litho pail would look lovely on display in your home.

Why not start a collection? Pails as fresh and bright as this look fantastic grouped together on a shelf.

H: 9 cm (excluding handle)
Top diameter: 9cm

Made in England by Acme Toys

name: Kaleidoscope
description:
"Look through the peephole and you'll see
Patterns pretty as can be".

Made by Acme Toys in England, this beautiful vintage lithographed tin kaleidoscope is still in working order. 

The illustrations are clean, vibrant and ever-so charming. 

A lovely display piece for vintage toy lovers and collectors.

20.5 cm High
5.5 cm Diameter.

name: Idea Book
description:
Yet another flash of inspiration?

No more excuses for not jotting down your brilliant thoughts, observations and projects!

Piqpoq's Idea Book is so stylish and practical that you'll be wanting to have it on hand at all times.  

Protected by a hardbound case, the 38-page Idea Book opens out accordian-style and is illustrated with simple, colourful graphics, acting as guidelines for your thoughts, doddles, photos and notes, indeed whatever you feel like including.

A beautiful boxed set that you will want to display, and a great gift for family and friends.

name: Magnets
description:
Magnets, Magnets? But we already have enough magnets!
Yes, but these are no ordinary magnets, they're French, made with love and fun!

Measuring 2.5cm in diameter, we guarantee that Monsieur Esprit, Monsieur Béret Orange, Monsieur Léo, Monsieur Mimi and Monsieur Capuchat will cheer you up in no time.

Told you! Your fridge is smiling already! 

Made by Mélaminebonnemine, France.

name: Progressive Family
description:
Grandma, Grandpa, Mum, Dad and Child, how nice to be able to hold three generations in the palm of your hand! 

We love wooden toys and immediately fell for this Progressive Family designer toy by Rihard Funts, Rijada.

Made from eco-friendly pine and deliberately simple, with neutral expressions, The Progressive Family was created to stimulate children's imagination. 

A smart designer toy, devoid of CE Toy Safety certification, it would look lovely sitting on your desk.

Set of 5 pieces, weighing 200g and measuring 10x6x5cm.

Love!

name: Puppy Puzzle
description:
Yes, you're right, we have a soft spot for wooden jigsaw puzzles, big and small! 

Propped up against a wall, on a shelf or even framed, vintage jigsaws make great display pieces in the home. This sweet seventies puppy puzzle would be perfect for a nursery or a child's room, for example.

A small wooden tray puzzle in reasonable vintage condition (paint chipped off in a few places, see photos).  
Teal, chocolate, caramel and white, the jigsaw measures 17cm x 17cm.

name: Fortune Teller
description:
Improve your family's French with this simple paper toy from Mélaminebonnemine. 

For some it's a fortune teller, for others a cootie catcher (or chatterbox). No matter what you call it, this old-fashioned paper origami game will make you smile. We all played fortune-telling when we were young and our children love to see what funny things chance will make us do.

Handfolded, eight fortunes to be discovered, printed on glossy paper 100g, 10 x10 cm.

name: Owl Softie
description:
Kate Durkin's animal pillows appeal to people of all ages. 

This dark brown owl measures about 21cm long and 13cm wide (base). It is handembroidered with white, fawn and blue-gree  heavy duty thread on the front and has a pretty green and white floral pattern on the back.
Stuffed with a super soft poly-fill.

Modern and versatile, it would look great on a sofa, a shelf or simply in your child's arms.

name: Cut & Make Czech Circus
description:
We have a feeling that a few crafty parents will enjoy making and playing with this fun and quirky circus designed and made by JouJou.

The six-member troupe comes beautifully packaged in a handmade box, and includes the Ringmaster, clown, two circus performers, an elephant and a bear.  

All you have to do is cut out the dolls, decorate with the pretty selection of patterned paper provided and join the limbs together using brads (please note, the brads are very tiny and must not be left in the hands of small children).

The circus paper puppets are printed on thick A5 creamy-white paper and the elephant and the bear on even stiffer coloured card stock. 

Box Size 18 x 12.5 cm 

This set would make an unusual gift at birthdays and other celebrations throughout the year. It is beautifully presented, but please note, due to the presence of small parts, more suited to older children.

name: Flower Children Paper House Kit
description:
One of Kickcan & Conkers' favourite finds this year! 

Hutch Studio's easy-to-make paper houses look great on a bookshelf, strung up together in a garland or hung in a window, as shown in the last photograph.

This little paper house kit consists of "reprinted" vintage book pages on heavy weight cardstock. The pieces are pre-scored for easy folding and have peel & stick tavs for simple assembly. Instructions are included.

The book used for this little house is "Flower Children". 
The house measures 10.2 cm h x 6.4 cm w x 6.4 cm d when completed.

Start a collection now!

name: The Rooftop Garden
description:
Far from here there is a castle that is as big as a city, and in that castle there lives a prince who doesn’t want to be a prince.  So, when everyone else is asleep he climbs dusty and forgotten stairways to the rooftops…where every night a garden grows.

The Rooftop Garden is the first in a series of four stories about the sky from The PearBox Press. Beautifully illustrated, it is perfect for children and daydreamers of any age.

Text and illustration by Ed Boxall, The Pearbox Press (2009);

Soft cover, 36 fully illustrated pages.
21 x 15 cm, printed in deep blue on quality uncoated paper.

name: Ladybug, Ladybug, Fly Away Home
description:
"We shoo flies, and we slap at mosquitoes but we are gentle with ladybugs, why?" 
Well, this Let's-Read-And-Find-Out Science Book, written by Judy Hawes and illustrated by Ed Emberley, has all the answers. Indeed, we even know where the saying 'Ladybug, ladybug, flay away home' comes from now, so that's a definite plus.

Published in 1967 by Thomas Y. Crowell Company, New York, this hardback is a joy to read. It shows some signs of external wear (corner tips of spine,  front cover) but all 33 pages are clean, bright and feature Ed Emberley's wonderful, colourful illustrations (a few in black and white).

20 x 19cm.

"For the child who is eager to know"...
